body.name: Alba Botanica Hemp Balancing Toner, 6 oz
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Saturday, February 17. Order within 8 hrs 30 mins
features: One 6 oz. bottle of Alba Botanica Hemp Balancing Toner
Helps soothe, balance and comfort stressed out skin
Made with a plant-based blend of botanical ingredients that provides a boost of hydration and a balanced pH
100% vegetarian formula made without harsh ingredients like parabens, phthalates, sulfates, artificial colors or synthetic fragrances
Always cruelty-free, never tested on animals; recognized by the Leaping Bunny Program
Shake gently, close eyes and mouth and hold bottle 6-8 inches away from body to lightly mist over face, neck and décolletage. Apply after cleansing morning and evening.
body.description: Alba Botanica Hemp Balancing Toner Mist is an alcohol-free toner, infused with cold-pressed hemp see oil, witch hazel & aloe vera. Helps soothe, balance & comfort stressed out skin.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Alba Botanica Balancing Toner Alba Botanica Balancing Toner Mist is an alcohol-free toner, infused with witch hazel & aloe. Helps soothe, balance & comfort stressed out skin. Our 100% vegetarian formula is hypo-allergenic and does not contain any parabens, phthalates or harsh sulfates. It is also not tested on animals.

Leaping Bunny Certified* Alba Botanica is grounded in compassion and the ethical treatment of all living things. We look out for our furry friends by ensuring that none of our products, or any of the ingredients in them, are tested on animals. The Leaping Bunny* logo is an internationally recognized symbol for cruelty-free cosmetics, personal care, and household products. *Certification for cruelty free was given by the CCIC on October 1st, 2008. 100% Vegetarian* We love our friends, including the furry kind. That’s why we never test our products or any of the ingredients in them on animals. Our products contain no meat or by-products of animals. We also exclude all cruelly obtained animal ingredients. *see ingredients list No Harsh Sulfates* We believe in using natural ingredients and not harsh sulfates that can damage the hair and scalp. Products that have too strong of a sulfate presence have been known to break down naturally occurring oils in your hair and scalp. At Alba Botanica, we provide products that advocate for a healthy scalp and healthy hair, without using harsh sulfates. *see ingredients list

The Alba Botanica brand was born in 1979 and follows a simple mission – to Do Beautiful. To honor that vision, we created a vibrant line of body-loving products that nourish the skin, hair, and of course, the soul. Whether we’re creating a fan favorite formula or working on the next big thing, we’re dedicated to making high quality, 100% vegetarian products that overflow with botanical ingredients. From the choices we make in the field to the final products we put on shelves, we aim to help fellow women look beautiful on the outside while feeling beautiful on the inside.

Alba Botanica Hawaiian Facial Cleanser, Pore Purifying Pineapple Enzyme Alba Botanica Even & Bright Enzyme Scrub Alba Botanica Hawaiian Detox Cleanser Alba Botanica Acnedote Maximum Strength Face & Body Scrub More Hawaiian Hair Care Products from Alba Botanica This pore purifying cleanser, made with pineapple and papaya, washes away impurities, make-up and dullness. This gentle scrub, made with ground walnut shell powder, fights off dull, dry skin for a smooth, even complexion. This self-warming cleanser helps clear up oily and blackhead-prone skin with a blend of botanical ingredients that create a gentle and beneficial warming sensation. Made with a 2% salicylic acid and willow bark solution, this astringent treats and prevents acne and breakouts.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love it. Feels and smells good
reviews.reviewText: I use every morning after applying my makeup. Makes powder foundation last longer and look less powdery. Smells clean and my face feels hydrated not greasy

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Ease of use
reviews.reviewText: I love that this toner sprays on. It smells great and works well.

reviews.reviewText: I’m not really sure what toner is for but I use it everyday. This one smells a little earthy, but I like it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love all the products this company makes
reviews.reviewText: Honestly, I got this after I used the hemp serum, and that serum is a life savior .... it helped my skin so much to get rid of stress-caused acne

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Alba products are the best!
reviews.reviewText: Excellent toner to use after washing your face. Leaves skin clean yet never dry or oily.
